description: ff. 74. 235 x 152; 148 x 78 mm. 19 lin. 19th cen. Thabat, written at the request of Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan al-Kūrānī in 1064 H.: Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 448 (4a). Incip.: ... الحمد لله حمدا ىلىق بذاته المقدسة
author: Ibn Faqīh Fuṣṣah, ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī, 1596 or 7-1660 or 61.
title: Riyāḍ al-jannah fī āthār ahl al-sunnah
